N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.8 - Standards pertaining to recordkeeping

State Regulations
(a) The local governmental unit shall
maintain records of all service providers participating in the community based
service system for children with serious emotional disturbance. (b) The local governmental unit shall
maintain a record of referrals for service received by the community based
service system for children with serious emotional disturbance. Such record
shall include information on the disposition of all referrals. (c) The local governmental unit shall
maintain minutes of all meetings of the interagency group. (d) Such statistical information shall be
prepared and maintained as may be necessary for the effective operation of the
community based service system for children with serious emotional disturbance
and as may be required by the Office of Mental Health. (e) Statistical information shall be reported
to the Office of Mental Health in a manner and within time limits specified by
the Office of Mental Health and shall be the responsibility of an individual
whose name and title shall be known to the Office of Mental Health. Notes
